name: How It Feels (Geolocation for Mobile Phone)
name_original: How It Feels (Geolocation for Mobile Phone)
description:
How It Feels (Geolocation for Mobile Phone) is a game developed by RachelMonique. It was originally released in 2020.
You can play How It Feels (Geolocation for Mobile Phone) on Web. You can purchase the game on itch.io.
